edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.tests

Class AbstractLoggingTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.hul.ois.fits.tests.AbstractLoggingTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AudioStdSchemaTest, AudioStdSchemaTestXmlUnit_NoMD5, DocMDTest, DocMDXmlUnitTest, EbuCoreNormalizedRatioTest, EbucoreParseChannelPositionTest, FitsBasicAudioTest, FitsBasicTest, FitsBasicVideoTest, FitsOutputXmlTest, FitsOutputXmlTest_2, MixTest, OISConsolidatorTest, TextMDTest, TextMDXmlUnitTest, VideoStdSchemaTest, VideoStdSchemaTestXmlUnit, VideoStdSchemaTestXmlUnit_NoMD5, VTTToolTest, XmlContentConverterTest

    public abstract class AbstractLoggingTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This base class is for initializing logging for test classes to set the logging configuration in the Fits constructor by means of an environment variable. This allows for a separate logging configuration for test classes other than the default logging as set up within FITS.java.
    Author:
    dan179
    See Also:
    Fits.Fits(String, File)
